description: RDS Instance (TASK-005) must be deployed into the VPC created by TASK-004.
mitigation_plan: Tasks are sequential and performed by the same role.

description: The Backend JWT Guard (TASK-018) requires the Cognito User Pool (TASK-009) to be provisioned to fetch its JWKS endpoint.
mitigation_plan: DevOps to provide Cognito User Pool details to Backend team as soon as it's available.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks implementation of all backend security.

description: All feature development (starting with TASK-015) is dependent on a functional CI/CD pipeline (TASK-014) for automated testing and deployment.
mitigation_plan: RISK-003 Mitigation: Prioritize a minimal viable pipeline early; have a manual deployment plan as a backup.

description: The Custom Mode Execution Endpoint (TASK-041) is an orchestrator that directly invokes the Secure Formula Execution Lambda (TASK-040).
mitigation_plan: Develop a clear input/output contract for the Lambda function early.
impact_if_delayed: Blocks the core functionality of the custom modes feature.

description: The frontend sync trigger (TASK-047) relies on the backend's conflict resolution logic (TASK-048) to correctly handle 409 Conflict responses.
mitigation_plan: Define the 409 response payload contract early. Frontend can develop against a mocked API.
impact_if_delayed: Offline sync feature will be incomplete and potentially cause data loss.
